summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED EXCESSIVE BRAKE FAILURES.  HAD TO REPLACE BRAKE PADS AT 22000 MILES AND AGAIN AT 40000 MILES RESPECTIVELY.  THEN, AT 48000 MILES,  THE ENTIRE BRAKE SYSTEM FAILED, AND HAD TO BE REBUILT WITH NEW ROTORS/ CALIPERS AND PADS.  VEHICLE  WAS EXPERIENCING EXTREME VIBRATION WHEN BRAKING FROM SPEEDS OVER 40 MPH.*AK    PH   *JB
